name: Gulman 2: The Mystery of Magic Crystals

description:
!!READ THE DESCRIPTION SO YOU KNOW HOW TO INSTALL THE GAME!!

Welcome If You Came From My GulCry Games Well Youll Love To See More Shit Like Shit!  Just Letting You Know Gulman 1 Will Not Be On Itch.io Its Fucked If You Run It On An American PC.  (NOTE THIS IS NOT MY GAME I JUST REUPLOADED SOMEBODYS MISTAKE I AM NOT GETTING PAID FOR THIS AS I AM NOT A SCUMBAG!)

  • Download the full version of the game.
  • Enter key 20202020.
  • Enjoy, our incredible friends.
  • If the game does not start, then launch this batch file: C:\Program Files (x86)\Gulman.ru\Gulman 2\SetQualityMedium.bat
GULMAN-2

A game by "famous" artist Svyatoslav Gulyaev. The game represents a fusion of detective adventure story with quest-arcade-shooter atmosphere.

Yeah If You Really Think His Games Are Good You Are Mentally Insane.
